name: Prevalence of Obesity - WHO (2019)
title: Prevalence of Obesity - WHO (2019)
description:
This dataset presents the prevalence of obesity per region by gender for people aged 18 and above.

Obesity is defined as having a body-mass index (BMI) equal to or greater than 30. BMI is a person's weight in kilograms divided by his or her height in metres squared.

sources.name: World Health Organization, Global Health Observatory (2019)
sources.additionalInfo:
This dataset presents the prevalence of obesity per region by gender for people aged 18 and above.

Obesity is defined as having a body-mass index (BMI) equal to or greater than 30. BMI is a person's weight in kilograms divided by his or her height in metres squared.

fields.name: Prevalence of obesity (both sexes)
fields.description: Prevalence of obesity in adults aged 18 and above.

fields.name: Prevalence of obesity (male)
fields.description: Prevalence of obesity in males aged 18 and above.
